main: ^Maayong Buntag! (Good day!) I'm Zardo Domenios, and you can call me Zardo! I'm a professional diver here in the Philippines.

c-0: ^Yes! But my wife died in an accident.
^Sorry to hear that. Do you mind if I ask why she died
^No! It is okay. She died 3 years ago because she drowned during our trip in Palawan. That's the most tragic and devastating moment of my life.
^It really is! We, Filipinos know how to smile and face our lowest.
^Thanks for sharing a little bit about yourself.
^No worries. You can ask me about beautiful oceans that I visit here in the Philippines.
